modelView:
{
      "type": "page",
      "name": "ValidationDemoPage",
      "title": "Validation Control Demo Page",
      "components": [
            {
                  "type": "form",
                  "name": "form1",
                  "label": "Common Form",
                  "submit": "($form1.$valid) && (\n  $form1.$visible=false)",
                  "submitLabel": "Submit and hide",
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "type": "text",
                              "name": "input11",
                              "label": "This is a required field",
                              "required": true,
                              "validation": {
                                    "pattern": "\\d+",
                                    "maxlength": 3,
                                    "minlength": 2
                              },
                              "parameters": {},
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "readonly": false,
                              "placeholder": "Enter between 2 and 3 digits"
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "number2",
                              "type": "number",
                              "label": "Number Not required",
                              "parameters": {},
                              "validation": {
                                    "min": -10,
                                    "max": 100,
                                    "minlength": 2
                              },
                              "required": false,
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "fractionDigits": 2,
                              "readonly": false
                        },
                        {
                              "type": "text",
                              "parameters": {},
                              "validation": {
                                    "pattern": "^\\w+$"
                              },
                              "readonly": false,
                              "required": false,
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "label": "Input with pattern ^\\w+$",
                              "name": "inputPattern"
                        }
                  ],
                  "nextButtonLabel": "Next",
                  "showInitially": true
            }
      ],
      "scriptingLanguage": "JavaScript"
}
